Text: Ty to the ULer. looks like im the first comment. Ill be back to rate this DL after it finishes. There are alot of titles here that im not familiar with, most of the earliest works, and i had thought, before now, that i had read almost all of his books. These are all DRK titles right?

Ive successfully finished downloading but i dont know how to open the files. I selected a book (Dark of the Woods) just a random choice, and tried to open it but i get a message saying windows cannot open. I tried to use Adobe Reader but it doesnt read .opf or .MOBI and i dont have a clue what that means myself. =(

**CAN SOMEONE HELP PLEASE? I would appreciate any assistance you can offer.

I googled mobi ereader and found the link below:-


http://www.mobipocket.com/en/downloadsoft/ProductDetailsReader.asp

Try the above link it is a free mobi e- reader.
Download and install it.  


Hope this will help you.
